display_long_description:
Juice Tag
Get Moving. Get Tagging. Get Happy!

Get ready to swing, jump, and tag your way to nonstop fun in Juice Tag—a high-energy, movement-based game that brings gorilla-style locomotion to life! Whether you’re chasing your friends or dodging tags with slick maneuvers, every match is packed with chaotic fun and feel-good vibes.

Key Features:

 Gorilla Movement Mechanics – Swing through the environment using your arms like a gorilla! It's fast, fluid, and incredibly fun.

 Addictive Tag Gameplay – Classic tag gets a juicy twist! Run, chase, dodge, and outsmart your friends in thrilling rounds that never get old.

 Vibrant Environments – Explore playful, colorful maps designed for movement, creativity, and maximum fun.

 Laugh-Out-Loud Multiplayer – Play with friends or make new ones! Juice Tag is all about good vibes and great times.

 Fast to Learn, Hard to Master – Easy for beginners to jump in, but with movement tricks and strategies to keep even seasoned players hooked.

Whether you're swinging solo or joining the crew, Juice Tag is your ticket to pure joy and physical fun. So what are you waiting for? Dive in, tag out, and let the happiness begin!
